title: EP 119: Mr. Mixx Details how Luke passed on Scarface
itunes:title: EP 119: Mr. Mixx Details how Luke passed on Scarface
description:
We sit down with Mr. Mixx, The South's first super producer with the infamous 2 Live crew. We talk about some of the rappers Luke missed out on, The fight they had with the US government over censorship, DJ Toomp's early years, how he saw RIck Ross go from 0 to 100 and much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
